name: Lorisa Teara
review: Have had three appointments at this location and each time was pleasant. The ladies in the front are so polite and accommodating and the doctor was always prompt. Never waited more than 10 minutes after appointment time to be seen or had any bad experiences.Not sure why every other comment is so negative.Always a great experience!!!

name: Jack Jacson
review: For my first ever visit great experience from start to finish. Staff was friendly and welcoming. And with covid I felt safe knowing how clean/sanitized everything was.Everyone from receptionist to picking out my glasses were friendly and very professional.Very happy to see the entire friendly staff, making it, Covid safe, for all. Highly recommend!
